Just read through these descriptions of how abortions are done and maybe you'll think differently about your view if you support it..
 
 Descriptions of abortion methods
 
 Suction curretage
 The abortion dilates the woman's cervix and inserts a tube with a sharp edge on the tip. The other end of the tube is connected to a suction device, similar to a home vacuum cleaner but much more powerful. Between the sharp edge and the force of the suction, the developing baby is torn apart and the pieces sucked out through the tube.
 
 This method is usually used for first-trimester abortions.
 
 Dilation and Extraction (D&X)
 The unborn baby is partially delivered feet first, until just the head remains inside the uterus. Then a hole is punched in the back of the skull with a sharp object and the brains are suctioned out. Once the baby is dead, the head is also pulled out of the uterus.
 
 This method is usually used for late second-trimester and third-trimester abortions.
 
 Dilation and Evacuation (D&E)
 A seaweed-based substance called "laminaria" is inserted into the cervix to dilate it, usually overnight. The next day forceps with sharp metal teeth are inserted and used to twist and tear off the unborn baby's limbs and remove them piece by piece. The head is usually too large to be removed whole and must be crushed.
 
 This method is usually used for second-trimester abortions.
 
 Saline Instillation (Salt Poisoning)
 Salt water is injected into the womb through the mother's abdomen. The unborn baby swallows this fluid and is poisoned by it. Within 24 hours the mother goes into labor and delivers a dead baby.
 
 This method is usually used for second- and third- rimester abortions. It is disliked because it is unreliable, and the baby would often be delivered premature but alive and seriously injured and then set on a table to die.
 
 Prostaglandin Instillation
 A chemical of a class known as "prostaglandins" is injected into the womb. It causes the mother to go into early labor with very strong contractions. These contractions crush the baby, which combined with the premature delivery is usually fatal.
 
 Non-surgical
 This is a general term that primarily includes abortions induced by drugs, such as Methotrexate or RU-486. Some of these directly poison the developing baby; others interfere with or cut off the supply of nutrients.

Between the sharp edge and the force of the suction, the developing baby is torn apart and the pieces sucked out through the tube.
 
 This method is usually used for first-trimester abortions.

 
 In the first trimester there is no consciousness and no possibility of pain. This method is safe for the woman.
 
 

 Dilation and Extraction (D&X)
 The unborn baby is partially delivered feet first, until just the head remains inside the uterus. Then a hole is punched in the back of the skull with a sharp object and the brains are suctioned out. Once the baby is dead, the head is also pulled out of the uterus.
 
 This method is usually used for late second-trimester and third-trimester abortions.

 
 This method is also used when there are developmental problems that are fatal for the fetus and dangerous for the woman, such as when the head of the fetus baloons up to many times its normal size and delivering it vaginally could kill the woman.
 
 

 Dilation and Evacuation (D&E)
 A seaweed-based substance called "laminaria" is inserted into the cervix to dilate it, usually overnight. The next day forceps with sharp metal teeth are inserted and used to twist and tear off the unborn baby's limbs and remove them piece by piece. The head is usually too large to be removed whole and must be crushed.
 
 This method is usually used for second-trimester abortions.

 
 D&X replaced this method.
 
 

 Saline Instillation (Salt Poisoning)
 Salt water is injected into the womb through the mother's abdomen. The unborn baby swallows this fluid and is poisoned by it. Within 24 hours the mother goes into labor and delivers a dead baby.
 
 This method is usually used for second- and third- rimester abortions. It is disliked because it is unreliable, and the baby would often be delivered premature but alive and seriously injured and then set on a table to die.

 
 This method has not been used for decades.
 
 

 Prostaglandin Instillation
 A chemical of a class known as "prostaglandins" is injected into the womb. It causes the mother to go into early labor with very strong contractions. These contractions crush the baby, which combined with the premature delivery is usually fatal.

 
 This is used for tubal pregnancies, which cannot be continued without killing both the fetus and the woman.
 
 

 Non-surgical
 This is a general term that primarily includes abortions induced by drugs, such as Methotrexate or RU-486. Some of these directly poison the developing baby; others interfere with or cut off the supply of nutrients.

Hunter - no, but it might help you guys in the pro-paternalism camp to understand what it means to be pro-choice.
 
 Yes, I said pro-choice. Being pro-choice means that you uphold a woman's right to decide what is done with her body (including the killing of any unwelcome residents), and prefer that right to any rights a fetus might have to being carried to term. 
 
 Pro-choice means supporting a woman's decision in the matter, whether it is a good choice or a bad choice. 
 
 It's a question of value. You guys hold the right of the fetus to be carried to term as paramount and appear to be willing to violate a woman's right to choose. We hold the woman's right to choose to be paramount.
 
 It's not the case that we don't feel compassion, and indeed you slander us with that accusation. I repeat that the pro-choice position is not a case of compassion for the fetus or lack thereof. 
 
 We feel compassion for any mother brought to such a decision and for the child that may be lost to us. However, we also feel compassion for the unwilling mother, and the unwanted child. 
 
 Ideally women should be willing to bring unwanted children to term so that others may raise them. 
 
 But when they aren't, we respect that autonomy and try to give them access to the safest abortion procedures possible in order to minimize the potential harm. 
 
 Compassion, the ethic of care, requires that we respect the choice of the mother in this matter over the life of the fetus.

 I would say that such an inference is actually contrary to common sense. Common sense suggests that there is a distinction between hearing more about something and there actually being more of something. 
 
 In fact such a sentiment is an example of sloppy reasoning. The particular fallacy is that of "affirming the consequent". Or as one of my old professors once called it 'modus XXXXXX'.
 
 Notice that I'm not saying whether your claim about whether the phenomenon of infant abandonment has increased is false. It could be true. However, you are unjustified in supposing that because you hear about it more often it must be happening more often. 
 
 So in the absence of anyone being able to make such an inference, why else might you suppose that infant abandonment is happening more often?

Little Jimmy was out playing with his friends on his bike. Unbeknownst to little Jimmy, he was heading for a huge bump in the road. Zooming over the bump, little Jimmy wrecked right into a tree. His friends quickly gathered around him and noticed he was unconscious.

 
 ...and his friends run off. 
 
 

 Moments later, an ugly, ugly man approached little Jimmy. He too noticing that little Jimmy was unconscious breathed a sigh of relief. Because little Jimmy could feel no pain, the ugly, ugly man carefully removed all of Jimmy's limbs with his swiss army knife. The ugly, ugly man then just walked away.

 
 Moments later, Sigma and Cone approached, arguing. They both saw the boy and Sigma exclaimed, "We must get him to the hospital so he does not bleed to death!"
 
 Cone, on the other hand, wiped the tears from Cone's eyes and said, "We must give him something for the pain and make him more comfortable!"
 
 Sigma looked at Cone like Cone was crazy. Little Jimmy was unconsious, it was pointless to worry about whether he currently was in pain because little Jimmy could not feel pain. It would be equally pointless to worry about little Jimmy's comfort, because little Jimmy could not feel comfort or discomfort at the moment. Disregarding Cone's idiotic comment, Sigma spotted Cone's car and said, "Lets get him to the hospital in your car" and ran to open the door as Cone gingerly picked up little Jimmy and slowly walked to the car, apparently not wanting to cause the unconscious boy any pain. 
 
 Cone tried to carfully put Jimmy in the seat sitting up, because that would be most comfortable, but Jimmy would not stay that way, being unconcious. Sigma pushed Cone aside and, always mindful that Jimmy would not sustain more physical injury and his current wounds wouldn't be worsened, put him in the car in a position that would be extremely uncomfortable for him had he been conscious but allowed him to stay in the car and he would not move as the two drove. Cone gasped, "Have you no compassion! He must be in pain in that position!" Again ignoring Cone, Sigma got in the car with Cone and drove to the hospital.
 
 At the hospital, the staff was able to regrow little Jimmy's limbs using new technology. The process was very itchy and very painful, and Cone whimpered at Sigma's side. "Poor poor Jimmy", sobbed Cone, "the pain must be driving him mad!". Sigma could not take any more and pummeled Cone for the idiocy Cone just spouted.
 
 The next morning Jimmy was awake. Sigma was at his side and told him, "We will find the man who did this to you and make sure he is punished!".
 
 Cone sat on Jimmy's other side. "I'm so sorry you were in such pain! Sigma here has no compassion for all the pain and torment you went through."
 
 Jimmy looked at Cone, confused. "I... didn't feel any pain. I was unconscious."
 
 Cone's face turned hard. "That's just leftist propaganda. Of course you were in pain. Horrible pain." Sigma just shook Sigma's head in disbelief.
 
 "Anyway", Sigma continued, "we will make sure the horrible man who did this is punished. Your rights were violated when he took parts of your body away. No one can do that to you against your will and--"
 
 "Actually", Cone interrupted, "I've heard about men like that. They harvest body parts to save other's lives, and of course life, no matter whos, is always more important than other's rights to their body. Sorry Jimmy. If you had died then I would say we should punish him but since you are fine now it's no big deal."
 
 "What!" sputtered Sigma. "Even if that man was saving a life, little Jimmy's body is not fair game! He didn't give his permission for his body to be used in that way, and even if he would be fine afterwards it is not 'ok' to use his body like that!"
 
 "Hey, we all know these men are out there and do this to unconsious people", said Cone in a righteous voice. "Jimmy knew that a possible consequence to riding his bike was to have an accident and fall unconscious and he has to 'deal with' the consequences of his actions. He practically invited someone to harvest his body parts when he rode his bike!"
 
 ...
 
 Jimmy wakes up in horror, and gradually calms as he realizes he does not live in Cone's world, but in a world that is a bit more compassionate.
